about_the_game:
By purchasing the Weird West Stories Book you will immediately get two unique outfits: Male Bandit and Female Adventurer, and also a Red Scarf mask. The story book allows you to pass unique challenges for 2 months. Fulfill challenges and discover new Weird West items in the workshop!

Significantly increase your speed of getting new items by
  • Additional challenges for 2 months, one every day with double rewards! (You can have 7 in progress challenges from this book at maximum)
  • +50% (and up to 150% with additional items from workshop) bonus to the experience you will receive in battles.

You will also have the opportunity to create unique items with the book:
  • 2 gestures
  • 6 masks
  • 1 minions
  • 3 pants
  • 2 sprays
  • 5 suits
  • 1 tombstone
  • 1 weapon
  • Mexican boombox

And that's not all!

By purchasing the Weird West Stories Book you will immediately get two unique outfits: Male Bandit and Female Adventurer, and also a Red Scarf mask. The story book allows you to pass unique challenges for 2 months. Fulfill challenges and discover new Weird West items in the workshop!

Significantly increase your speed of getting new items by
  • Additional challenges for 2 months, one every day with double rewards! (You can have 7 in progress challenges from this book at maximum)
  • +50% (and up to 150% with additional items from workshop) bonus to the experience you will receive in battles.

You will also have the opportunity to create unique items with the book:
  • 2 gestures

name: Cuisine Royale - The Weird West Stories Book

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit /8 64bit /10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 560 or better, AMD Radeon 77XX or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Please note, that for Nvidia GPUs second digit matters a lot, so 640 or 730 are much slower than 560!
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 64bit /8 64bit /10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 1060 or better, AMD Radeon RX480 or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 6 GB available space

short_description: By purchasing the Weird West Stories Book you will immediately get two unique outfits: Male Bandit and Female Adventure, and also a Red Scarf mask. The story book allows you to pass unique challenges for 2 months. Fulfill challenges and discover new Weird West items in the workshop!
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French*, German*
*languages with full audio support
